concept_description.en: Employment of children below the legally permitted age or adolescents in hazardous work
concept_description.hi: कानूनी रूप से अनुमत आयु से कम बच्चों या खतरनाक कार्यों में किशोरों का रोजगार

intent_scope: Children working in shops, factories, or hotels
Kids working instead of going to school

applicable_acts.act_name: The Child Labour (Prohibition and Regulation) Amendment Act, 2016

core_rules: Employment of children below the permitted age is prohibited
Adolescents are not allowed to work in hazardous occupations
citizen_rights: Right to report child labour activities
recommended_actions: Collect basic information about the incident
Report the matter to the Labour Department or child helpline
Inform the Child Welfare Committee if required

concept_description.en: Unfair treatment, unsafe conditions, or exploitation of workers hired through contractors
concept_description.hi: ठेकेदारों के माध्यम से नियोजित श्रमिकों का शोषण या असुरक्षित कार्य परिस्थितियाँ

intent_scope: Poor working conditions for contract workers
No basic facilities provided by contractor
Exploitation by contractor or principal employer
Unsafe work environment for contract labour

applicable_acts.act_name: The Contract Labour (Regulation and Abolition) Act, 1970

core_rules: Contract labour must be regulated under law
Principal employer is responsible for the welfare of contract workers
Basic facilities and fair treatment must be ensured
citizen_rights: Right to basic facilities and safe working conditions
Right to fair treatment regardless of contract status
recommended_actions: Collect employment details and proof of working conditions
Raise the issue with the contractor or principal employer in writing
Approach the Labour Department or Labour Officer
File a formal complaint if the issue continues
